thread.title: Kynan
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Kynan

author: Kynan
title: Kynan
text: Not the largest selection of vaporizers out there, but definitely has some quality products for any budget. Website is very professional and clean looking. Product arrived as ordered, took a bit longer than expected to be delivered in Canada, seems it got held up at international shipping center in San Francisco for a while (USPS would be at fault for this). Overall good experience and included some freebies, would recommend!
